entities.description: A numeric code representing a specific category of criminal offense.
A description of the type of criminal offense.
The count of times a particular offense has been reported, not adjusted for demographic or sample weights.
The percentage of the given offense relative to the total number of offenses reported.

relationships.description: Associates a specific criminal offense with its code.
Provides a description for a specific criminal offense.
Indicates the count of how many times an offense occurred, without weighting.
Indicates the percentage of each offense relative to the total offenses.
